amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that there should be parity in the adjustment in pay rates for members of the uniform services and civilian employees of the United States, including prevailing rate employees, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 174 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1406) To express the sense of Congress that there should be parity in the adjustment in pay rates for members of the uniform services and civilian employees of the United States, including prevailing rate employees, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 174 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Akaka.
